GlooApplication - Class in GlooKit.GlooFramework
A GlooApplication is a game (or other application) within a GLWF window that handles the game loop for the whole application.
GlooApplication(String) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.GlooApplication
Creates a new GlooApplication given a name, which creates a GLFW window for the application with the specified configurations in the config file (which is the file with the name name.cfg).
GlooApplicationConfiguration - Class in GlooKit.GlooFramework
GlooApplicationConfiguration is essentially a handle for accessing config files (.cfg) for the GlooApplication Allows for the configuration of fullscreen mode, window pointSize, and frames per second
GlooApplicationConfiguration(String) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.GlooApplicationConfiguration
Attempts to load a config file.
GlooApplicationWindow - Class in GlooKit.GlooFramework
 
GlooApplicationWindow(GlooApplicationConfiguration) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooFramework.GlooApplicationWindow
 
GlooBatch - Class in GlooKit.GlooAPI
GlooBatches are large collections of primitives that will be drawn to the screen.
GlooBatch(GlooApplication, float, boolean, TextureAtlas) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooBatch
 
GlooBatch.Batch - Class in GlooKit.GlooAPI
A Batch is a collection of sub-batches (which are referenced by channels) Batch is basically a list of list of drawing objects Each list of drawing objects is a sub-batch (channel) In addition to containing the batches, they also hold lists of vertices and indices buffers When an object is added to a batch, it must be added to a particular channel This allows for multithreading to occur as each thread can addBatch a processed drawing object to a particular channel that no other thread is modifying (thereby avoiding synchronization!) Note that while the channels get reset each frame, the buffers persist, ensuring that the game runs faster
GlooCharacter - Class in GlooKit.GlooAPI
 
GlooCharacter(FontRenderContext, Font, GlooFontFamily, int, boolean) - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooCharacter
 
GlooCore - Class in GlooKit.GlooAPI
All drawing calls pass through here at some point in time.
GlooCore() - Constructor for class GlooKit.GlooAPI.GlooCore
 
GlooCore.BatchQueue - Class in GlooKit.GlooAPI
The BatchQueue is specific to the GlooCore (GlooSockets don't have them) The BatchQueue is basically a list of batches, but it also has a specific iterator, which allows it to do pass off batches to different threads without them conflicting with each other Author: Duncan Walter Documenter: Eli Jergensen
